content.text:
HON. GWEN MOORE

                              of wisconsin

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 1, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Ms. MOORE. Mr. Speaker, on October 31, I was absent for recorded vote 
No. 591. Had I been present, I would have voted YEA.
content.speaker: Ms. MOORE
